metadata.title: CVE-2021-47360 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: binder:make sure fd closes complete During BC_FREE_BUFFER processing, theBINDER_TYPE_FDA object cleanup may close 1 or more fds. The closeoperations are completed using the task work mechanism -- which means thethread needs to return to userspace or the file object may never bedereferenced -- which can lead to hung processes. Force the binder threadback to userspace if an fd is closed during BC_FREE_BUFFER handling.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
